title: Astronomical Monetization!
text:
Mage and Minions monetization went astronomical today, with the arrival of the first flag-bearing minion on the surface of the Moon.
		
Developers deny rumors the expedition was faked.

title: No News Like Old News
text: No news like old news! Making Fun is bringing back old breaking news for your re-reading pleasure. Enjoy!

title: Daily Dog Incident
text: Dog bring news. News bring shame to politician. Politician commit suicide. But human not read news. Dog funny.
